item.description:
Thanks for our member Ela giving us info. for this event, and share us some information about a film screen that she is organizing at Boston University. The documentary that will be shown is "Afghan Star". Here is a link to the trailer http://www.youtube.co.... There will be a question and answer session with professors from BU who have studied Afghanistan. The movie goes beyond the pop idol show and delves into issues of democracy and gender inquality and many others as well. The movie has english subtitles.

for more info. please visit website http://www.bu.edu/php....

or email Ela at macanderela@hotmail.com

This event will be hold from 7pm to 9:30pm

Thanks for all of your supporting!

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Afghan Star
